General.Name: Sebo Manufacturing Engineering & Construction Corp
General.Description: Sebo Manufacturing, Engineering & Construction Corp. operates as a construction company in South Korea and internationally. The company offers duct system used in office, medical, residential, distribution, and airline facilities, as well as semiconductor manufacturing facilities; and permashield pipe system used in power generation and special gas production system, oil chemical, pharmaceutical manufacturer and bio, waste water treatment, and research facilities. It also provides module system, which manufactures and assembles pipes and ducts. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
